body:
When i do spack concretize -f it started showing up with this error.

==> Error: variant "header_only" not found in package "cgal"

I have not seen this error before but only today. I thought of removing cgal but it is one of the dependencies of openfoam. So i will be able to remove it as openfoam install is painfully and takes really longtime . So is there a workaround for this issue. I even tried to install cgal with header on and i get the same error. Is there a way to fix this ?

thanks
title: spack concretize issue
